title: E-Commerce Platform Migration to AWS
description: Led the complete migration of a monolithic e-commerce platform to AWS cloud infrastructure. Implemented auto-scaling, load balancing, and multi-region deployment for high availability.

title: Kubernetes Cluster Setup for FinTech
description: Designed and deployed a production-grade Kubernetes cluster for a financial services company. Implemented security best practices, monitoring, and disaster recovery solutions.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
description: Built comprehensive CI/CD pipelines for microservices architecture. Automated testing, security scanning, and multi-environment deployments with zero-downtime releases.

title: Infrastructure as Code Implementation
description: Transformed manual infrastructure provisioning to fully automated IaC using Terraform. Managed multi-cloud resources across AWS and Azure with version control.

title: Microservices Containerization
description: Containerized legacy monolithic application into microservices architecture. Implemented Docker containers, service mesh, and orchestration with Kubernetes.

title: Monitoring & Observability Platform
description: Deployed comprehensive monitoring solution with Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack. Implemented alerting, log aggregation, and performance dashboards.
